sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: BigBear.ai Stock (NYSE: BBAI) Weekend Update: Share-Authorization Vote Deadline Looms as Short Interest Stays Elevated
feed.summary: BigBear.ai (NYSE: BBAI) is facing a critical shareholder vote deadline on December 29th regarding a proposal to increase authorized common shares from 500 million to 1 billion. This vote is central to investor focus, especially given the stock's high volatility, elevated short interest (around 21.5% of public float), and recent declines. The company states this authorization provides flexibility for future strategic initiatives, though it does not imply immediate issuance of new shares.

feed.title: AI-powered radar aims to spot border threats in real time
